external_games.name: Generic Brazilian Favela Game with Generic Enemies 2003

name: Generic Brazilian Favela Game with Generic Enemies 2003
summary: Generic Brazilian Favela Game with Generic Enemies 2003 is a "very buggy" game developed by Joeveno, where you're Sledge MoreNeo, and you're wandering around a Generic Brazilian Favela because you suddenly appeared there. Heavily inspired by Max Payne, the game has bullet time, an old-school third-person camera, classic 2000s lock aiming, Matrix-styled hand-to-hand combat, rail grinding, and more. It also has a motorcycle.

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: Meu Novo Jogo Brasileiro GENÉRICO na Favela com Inimigos Genéricos (Trailer SAGE 2023) (PS2 like)
